T02D2814:168a-0: @168a * // dpal thugs rje chen po dri ma 'jig pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2814:168a-1: yang 'dir bshad par bya ba'i dus //
T02D2814:168a-2: snga dro 'dab chags sgra sgrogs tshe //
T02D2814:168a-3: dpal ldan po ta la rgyal ba //
T02D2814:168a-4: dad pa drag pos dmigs nas ni //
T02D2814:168a-5: me tog dmar po dri ngad bzang po gsungs pa ji snyed tshogs pa btus la /
T02D2814:168a-6: gser gyi snod dam kham pa'i snod yol mor spungs te /
T02D2814:168a-7: zangs sam mtshal gyis byugs pa'i bum pa rgyan dang
T02D2814:168a-8: bcas pa lnga tshan lngas gang ba dkar po'i chu
T02D2814:168a-9: dang sbyar bas yog pa lhag ma'i rgyun mchu gtigs
T02D2814:168a-10: nas 'bab pa steng du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2814:168a-11: ldong ros dang gal rtsi dang ga bur la sogs
T02D2814:168a-12: pa dri dam pas byugs pa'i sku gtsug tor du
T02D2814:168a-13: bzhugs so // shar dang lho dang nub byang rim //
T02D2814:168a-14: me long byug pa rnga yab rgyan //
T02D2814:168a-15: btags la thun mtshams phrin las dbul //
T02D2814:168b-0: thal sbyar mi g-yeng gus bstod @168b mchod //
T02D2814:168b-1: de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa'i khyad par rnam
T02D2814:168b-2: pa thams cad kyis rgya cher phu dung du byas
T02D2814:168b-3: te / snyan pa'i dbyangs dang lhan cig pa'i rol mo phul la bstod nas /
T02D2814:168b-4: lag pa rdo rje'i khu tshur bcangs pas rdo rje byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D2814:168b-5: rdo rje dang padma mtshon pa'i pi wang bsgreng zhing
T02D2814:168b-6: snyan pa'i nga ro gsangs bstod pas sngags ni bzla'o
T02D2814:168b-7: // aom aa ai au ae ao aam hr'i:badzra aa
T02D2814:168b-8: mri ta dza ra dza ra phem phem phem phat
T02D2814:168b-9: // sv'a h'a / 'od zer dmar po rgyus pa yi //
T02D2814:168b-10: sngags phreng dmar po 'khor lo can //
T02D2814:168b-11: cig car rtag tu bar ma chad //
T02D2814:168b-12: rgya mtsho la ni char rgyun bzhin //
T02D2814:168b-13: bdag nyid dri ma 'jig pa yi //
T02D2814:168b-14: spyan ras gzigs kyi nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2814:168b-15: ye shes bstims pa'i rjes la bum pa steng gi lha bdag nyid ji bzhin du bskyed de /
T02D2814:168b-16: bdag dang de'i srin lag nas 'bab par rig par bya'o //
T02D2814:168b-17: dngos sam nyams sam rmi lam na //
T02D2814:168b-18: lha mthong ba dang lus bkrus dang //
T02D2814:168b-19: bum nang pi wang sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2814:168b-20: grub pa'i ltas yin de nas spyad //
